DataElement.preferredName: Substance Administration Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity Order Care Setting Type Code ACT I2B2 CDM Medication Order Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._A coded value specifying the level of healthcare (care setting) the patient was in when the order was given._Location where medication was ordered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._A coded value specifying the level of healthcare (care setting) the patient was in when the order was given.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Substance Administration Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A material with particular features.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the level of healthcare (care setting) the patient was in when the order was given.

Concepts.definition: A coded value specifying the level of healthcare (care setting) the patient was in when the order was given.
